About Me

This section is about me.

The Golden Athletic Years
Sports!

I grew up playing a lot of soccer. While I wish I stuck with it, I made a transition to Track and Cross Country and really enjoyed the feeling of finishing a three mile race in record times every week. Threre was something soothing about being uncomfortable for 18 minutes that still confuses me today.

My Free Time
Video Games

A bulk of my childhood and current free time revolved around playing videogames. I remember being so curious as to how I was able to play Mario Party out of a plastic cartridge. Being able to put my mind towards something that seemed so magical kept me entertained for hours.
